column2: "Na David kaa ndwom yi mu nsɛm kyerɛɛ EWURADZE wɔ da a EWURADZE yii no fii n'atamfo nyinara nsamu
column3: na Saul nsamu no:"

column2: "na ɔsee dɛ
column3: EWURADZE nye mo botan

column2: "Mo botantsim Nyankopɔn a
column3: no mu na muguan modɔ; M'akokyɛm
column7: ɔwo na egye me fi akakabensɛm mu."

column2: "Mubosu afrɛ EWURADZE
column3: ɔno a ɔsɛ dɛ woyi no ayɛw no: Nna wɔbɛgye me efi m'atamfo nsamu."

column2: "Na owu asorɛkye twaa mo ho hyiae
column3: Mbusubɔ nsuyirii maa mo bo tui."

column2: "Samanadze ahoma brabraa mo ho: Owu ne mfir baa mo do."
"M'ahokyer mu musui frɛɛ EWURADZE
column3: Nyew
column4: me Nyankopɔn na mekaa mu frɛɛ no: Na ofi n'asɔrfi mu tsee me ndze

column2: "Nna asaase hihimii na ɔwosowee
column3: Ɔsor fapem tutui Na wohihimii

column2: "Wusiw fi n'ahwentokura mu firii
column3: Na ogya fi n'anomu hyeew adze: Ɔmaa biriw sɔe."

column2: "Ɔkontoom ɔsor so
column3: na odwirii; Na isum kebikebi dzi n'ananadze."

column2: "Na ɔtsena kerub do
column3: na otui: Nyew
column4: wohun no wɔ mframa ntsaban do."

column2: "Ɔdze isum yɛɛ asese bɔɔ noho aprɔw
column3: Nsu mboaboano

column2: "Hyerɛn a odzi n'enyim ntsi Ogyabiriw sɔe."
"EWURADZE bobɔɔ mu wɔ sor
column3: Na Ɔsorsornyi no maa wɔtsee ne ndze."

column2: "Na ɔtotoow ngyen menaba
column3: na ɔhotsee hɔn; Enyinam

column2: "Nna epo mu esuka yiyii hɔnho
column3: Wiadze fapem ho dedaa hɔ
column4: Wɔ EWURADZE ne nkaenyim no ntsi
column5: N'ahwentokura mu ehuhuw huuhuw no ntsi."

column2: "Ɔsomae fi sor bɛfaa me; Ɔtwee me fii nsu pii mu;"
"Ɔgyee me fii me tamfo ɔhoɔdzenfo no
column3: Na hɔn a wokyiir me no nsa; osiandɛ wɔyɛɛ dzen dodow maa me."

column2: "Wɔbɔtoatoaa me wɔ m'amandzehu da no mu: Na EWURADZE nye me kyirtaafo."
"Na ɔdze me so baa mbrɛ ɔtsɛw: Ɔgyee me
column3: osiandɛ n'enyi gyee mo ho."

column2: "EWURADZE tuaa me kaw dɛ mbrɛ me tsenenee tse: Dɛ mbrɛ me nsa ho tsew pa na ɔahyɛ me ananmu."
"Na mesie EWURADZE n'akwan no
column3: Na mommbɔɔ ehuhubra mimmfii me Nyankopɔn ho."

column2: "Na n'atsɛmbu nyinara wɔ m'enyi do: Na n'ahyɛdze so mimmfii ho."
"Midzii mu so wɔ n'afamu
column3: Na misiee moho fii m'emumuyɛ ho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE ahyɛ me ananmu dɛ mbrɛ me tsenenee tse; Dɛ mbrɛ m'ahofir wɔ n'enyiwa mu tse."
"Mbɔbɔrhufo na enye no bedzi no mbɔbɔr mu
column3: Nyia odzi mu na enye no bedzi no emudzi mu;"

column2: "Nyia no ho tsew
column3: na ebɛtsew woho akyerɛ no; Na nyia ɔyɛ nkɔntɔnkye dze ebɛkyea woho akyerɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔman amandzehufo no
column3: ɔwo ebɛgye hɔn: Na w'enyi sa nkontompɔfo

column2: "Na ɔwo EWURADZE
column3: na eyɛ me kandzea: Na EWURADZE bɛhyerɛn mo sum mu."

column2: "Na ɔwo na medze wo mutu mbirika tsew edɔm mu: Me Nyankopɔn na medze no huruw tra fasu."
"Nyankopɔn dze
column3: no kwan dzi mu: EWURADZE n'asɛm wɔasɔ ahwɛ; Ɔyɛ akokyɛm ma hɔn a woguan toa no nyinara."

column2: "Na woana nye Nyankopɔn
column3: gyedɛ EWURADZE nko? Na woana yɛ ɔbotan

column2: "Nyankopɔn nye m'akoban dzendzen: Na ɔgye nyia odzi mu no wɔ no kwan mu."
"Ɔyɛ ne nan dɛ adoa anan: Na ɔdze me si me mbea sorɔnsorɔm do."
"Ɔkyerɛ me nsa akodzi; Ma m'abasa tum kontom boran egyen."
"Eso edze wo nkwagye akokyɛm no ama me: Na w'ahobrɛadze ama mayɛ kɛse."
"Ɔwo atserɛw m'anamɔn mu wɔ m'ase
column3: Na m'anan mmpatserewee."

column2: "Metsiw m'atamfo
column3: na masɛɛ hɔn: Nkyii so mannsan bio dze kodur dɛ wowiee sa."

column2: "Na mahyew hɔn
column3: na mabɔ hɔn ehwira mu

column2: "Na ɔwo na edze ahoɔdzen abɔ me do ama akodzi: Ɔwo abrɛ hɔn a wɔsoɛr tsia me no adze ahyɛ m'ase."
"Ɔwo na ama m'atamfo so adan hɔn ekyir ama me
column3: Ma metwa hɔn a wɔtan me no egu."

column2: "Wɔhwɛe
column3: na ɔgyefo bi nnyi hɔ: Wɔhwɛɛ EWURADZE mpo

column2: "Nna moboor hɔn anhweanhwea dɛ famu huntuma
column3: Mitsiatsiaa hɔn do dɛ abɔntsen do dɛtse

column2: "Eso ɔwo eyi me efi me man hɔn akokoeko mu; Ɔwo ahwɛ me edze me ayɛ amanaman do tsitsir: Ɔman a minnyim hɔn no wɔbɔsom me."
"Ananaben bɛbrɛ hɔnho adze ama me: Wɔtse me nka ara a
column3: wobetsie me."

column2: "Ananaben bɛkyenkyen
column3: Na wɔdze ahohim fi hɔn sumabea aba."

column2: "EWURADZE tse ase; na nhyira nka mo botantsim no; Na abɔso nye mo nkwagye botan Nyankopɔn no:"
"Mekyerɛ Nyame a odzi wer ma me no
column3: Na ɔbrɛ aman adze hyɛ m'ase no
column5: "Na ɔdze me efi m'atamfo mu aba: Nyew
column6: ɔwo na ema me do bɔ hɔn a wɔsoɛr tsia me no do: Ɔwo na iyi me fi nyimpa kakaben no nsamu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: EWURADZE
column4: mebɛda wo ase wɔ amanaman mu
column5: Na matow ayɛyindwom ama wo dzin."

column2: "Nkwagye kɛse na ɔdze ma ne hen: Na ɔyɛ adɔyɛ ma nyia wɔasera no no
column3: David na n'asefo no daa."
